(d. 1412) [ Syr. Orth. ] Minor liturgical writer and Patr. patr. (1382–1412). He became a monk at Dayr al-Zaʿfarān before 1355, and was consecrated bp. of Amid in 1375. He wrote an Anaphora composed from earlier Anaphoras ( ms. Syr. Orth. Patr. Libr.), and a ḥusoyo for Saturday of Easter week. Sources Barsoum, Scattered pearls , 495. Dolabani, Patriarchen , 187. George A. Kiraz
